mod.name: PokeMod
mod.description: A mod that lets you be a Pokemon Trainer in the world of slay the spire!

cards.name: Pokegear 2.0

cards.description: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Rescue Stretcher+

cards.description: If this is the only card in your hand, Stun an enemy. Exhaust.

cards.name: Surprise Box+

cards.name: Ultra Ball
cards.description: Deal 20 damage. If this kills an enemy, catch it! One-time use.

cards.name: Ultra Ball+
cards.description: Deal 35 damage. If this kills an enemy, catch it! One-time use.

cards.name: Wondrous Labyrinth
cards.description: At the start of your turn, all enemies lose 1 Strength, unless they are at or below -2 Strength.

cards.name: Wondrous Labyrinth+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, all enemies lose 1 Strength, unless they are at or below -4 Strength.

relics.name: The Pokeball
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a Pokeball to your hand.

relics.name: Trainer's Cap
relics.description: Whenever you catch a Pokemon, gain 2 max HP.

relics.name: Poison Barb
relics.description: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, apply 2 Poison to the attacker.
relics.flavorText: Go ahead and hit me, see what happens!

relics.name: Lucky Egg
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a Pokemon, upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: It feels like you are getting stronger whenever you're around it.

relics.name: Lost Charger
relics.description: Usable once per turn. Right-click to exhaust a random card in your hand and gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Everything you put near this device is consumed and turned into energy.

relics.name: The Ultraball
relics.description: Replaces The Pokeball. At the start of each combat, add an Ultra Ball to your hand.
relics.flavorText: A nearly perfect version of the Pokeball.

relics.name: Toxic Orb
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 3 Poison to yourself and 9 Poison to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: You wonder why you keep holding onto this thing.
